page.title: 09NEWTOWN CHURCH SOCIAL EVENTS
page.content: There is a fine community spirit.The Holy Trinity Fellowship meets monthly, usually with a guest speaker on a topical subject, or outing to a place of interest. Social events are held to raise money for the church such as the annual Garden Fete in May which this year raised Â£1,800, an occasional concert, coffee morning or bazaar. The choir children have an annual camp and visits to Southampton Ice Rink.In 1985 the adults went to a Promenade concert in the Royal Albert Hall, London. A barbecue at Woodend and a Christmas Carol Party have become very popular annual events. A Harvest Supper is held at Rookesbury Hall after Festal Evensong in church. All produce donated for the decoration of the church is auctioned later and money raised sent for famine relief.
